text: The District of Orbe was a district in the canton of Vaud, Switzerland. The seat of the district was the town of Orbe. As of 2006 it became part of the Jura-Nord vaudois District. It contained the following municipalities: * Agiez * Arnex-sur-Orbe * Ballaigues * Baulmes * Bavois * Bofflens * Bretonnières * Chavornay * Corcelles-sur-Chavornay * Croy * Juriens * La Praz * L'Abergement * Les Clées * Lignerolle * Montcherand * Orbe * Premier * Rances * Romainmôtier-Envy * Sergey * Valeyres-sous-Rances * Vallorbe * Vaulion * Vuiteboeuf Category:Former districts of Vaud
title: Orbe (district)
